name: Cross Strike
description:
Description:
In the year of SC5910, the Sky Fortress was taken over by unknown enemies. Play as Cross, on a mission to resolve the crisis.

Credits: 

- Music "System Storm" by NemesisTheory
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/521439

- Music "Turn of Tides" by NemesisTheory
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/95281

- Music "Rose At Twilight" by NemesisTheory
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/193466

- Sound effects 効果音ラボ
https://soundeffect-lab.info/

- Font "Mechsuit" Fredric Harbin
https://www.behance.net/gallery/22656375/Mechsuit-Typefont

Controls:
(Support keyboard and gamepad. Keyboard control can be customized in the game options.)
- Arrows : Move
- Z : Jump
- X : Shoot
- Enter: Pause/Exit
